alert.note: Alert for Eastern Juab, Millard Counties (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 06 at 1:37PM MST until January 08 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 8 PM THIS EVENING TO 5 AM MST MONDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 5 to 10 inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Eastern Juab/Millard Counties. * WHEN...From 8 PM this evening to 5 AM MST Monday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible especially over mountain passes along Interstate 15. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit weather.gov/slc/winter. For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of Transportation, visit http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov.
